data.message: Why do I keep getting a network error? and how do I fix it, or can I fix it?

replies.message: Hey Martha. We’re sorry to hear that you’re experiencing issues with a network error. Please help us track this issue by reporting it in our Help Center. http://on.fb.me/18dEFaD -Sarah
Facebook you didn't answer my question  -_-

Hi Hevger. We’re currently only accepting verification requests from Pages that represent celebrities, public figures, sports teams, media and entertainment. Please keep in mind that most Pages and profiles, including local businesses, aren't eligible for verification at this time. You can learn more at:https://www.facebook.com/help/100168986860974. -Sarah
Hi Sarah i am a media center so Yes i am from media, and when i request i only get auto answer !! that my page is not ready to verify :(
